question: Why did Alauddin Khilji maintained control on price during his reign?
option1: He wanted to keep large army at lower expenses
option2: He had mercy with poor people
answer: He wanted to keep large army at lower expenses
explanation: Ala-ud-din Khalji introduced market control policy. This idea of making goods cheaper was probably introduced because Ala-ud-din wanted to pay his soldiers a low salary. It allowed him to maintain a large army on limited resources.
